title: pint (Cloudflare) PromQL Linting Integration
description:
Integrate pint for validating generated Prometheus alert rules:

1. Add optional --lint flag to nthlayer apply
2. Validate alerts.yaml after generation
3. Report issues before apply
4. Support .pint.hcl config for custom rules
5. CI integration with pint-action

Effort: 1 day
Priority: P0 - validates all generated alerts
